channel.title: Low-Code | Kaoto - The Integration Designer for Apache Camel

item.title: Kaoto Catalog Overview
item.description: In the following video you can get an overview of the Kaoto catalog which provides you a collection of all supported Camel components, processors and Kamelets. Additional features like showing the details of each catalog item as well as filtering capabilities are demoed as well.

item.title: Low-Code development with Kaoto
item.description: In the following video we can see how to use both the visual editor and the source editor to do rountrip editing on your Apache Camel integrations.
